results.title: Talent nite
results.brief_description: A cut-out animation of various humanised objects that perform on stage at a cabaret style nightclub. Dancing to a jazz-blues soundtrack the objects, and male crooner take it in turn to perform. The audience is eventually won over by an alluring stilleto shoe that symbolises woman and the womanly aspects of cabaret. Co-directed/animated/designed and concept by Craig L. Brooks and Nicole McKinnon.

group_siblings.title: The Great Australian cultural exchange programme

results.title: Pharmaceutical girl
results.creator_credit: Jeremy Parker, David Atkinson and Dik Jarman
results.brief_description: ‘Pharmaceutical girl’ is not strictly a claymation. The creator Dik Jarman with Nick Pledge set about experimenting with an alternate type of puppet. Pledge created an internal armitage complete with moving joints and rising chest cavity, whilst Jarman designed and sculpted the puppet using an alternate latex type of skin to form the flesh of the puppet. A surreal animation that takes us on the journey of Sukei and her addiction. Dealt mostly with symbolism, the pricks of the rose replace the syringe. The set (of which Jarman won an award for) is both functional for the purpose of shooting scenes with moveable walls etc, but also represents Sukei’s mind as the greater part of the set makes up the internals of a clock. As she begins to hallucinate the clock-like set begins to grind to a halt and then into reverse, Sukei’s dream takes over. What initially begins as peaceful escape quickly turns into a nightmare. (The soundtrack is by Edwina Blush and Thierry Cotco Lovett).
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeremy Parker, David Atkinson and Dik Jarman

results.title: Octikuki
results.brief_description: Octikuki uses 2D and 3D computer animation to create a futuristic creation scene. The animation plays with themes nature and science reading as a visual poem. The music soundtrack ‘Sweet Thunder’ is by Yello.

results.title: Not the chosen one
results.brief_description: A hand-drawn computer animation tells a story of a lonely man yearning for a lover. As the cold winter months pass into spring, his snowman companion melts into a woman. The man pursues the woman to discover he isn’t the chosen one and then becomes seduced by a frog.

results.title: Nice day
results.brief_description: A colour hand-drawn animation in response to the theme washing machine depicts an unhappy woman attending her domestic duties. She starts to imagine her husband is up to no good and in her rage is driven to drink.

results.title: Maya
results.brief_description: Maya is a non-narrative collage of various 2D computer animation styles and images. The layered and merging images are created by a number of methods employing various styles from pixilated hand-drawn images to photographically sourced images of ancient and contemporary Thai culture.
